fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces

Interface RequestI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RequestContinuationI

    public interface RequestI
extends java.io.Serializable
    The interface RequestI defines the methods that provides access to the information about a request.

    Description

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-12-11

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionInfoI clientConnectionInfo()
      return the connection information of the request client.
      QueryI getQueryCode()
      return the code of the query as an abstract syntax tree.
      boolean isAsynchronous()
      return true if the request can be executed asynchronously.
      java.lang.String requestURI()
      return the URI of the request.
